Ivodit 
( Bhattiprolu) 
We had occasion to use some of the Brahmi syllables, e.g. * for T in T-tube). 
It will be observed that Brahmi covers many more forms than does the Roman, and that they can be utilised with perfect ease. It is, of course, expected that every Indian student will familiarize himself with the script that is the progenitor of his own. 
At the end it is my great joy to be able to state that in the meander ing mazes of modern terminology there has been kept up so much affinity between old words and new that it is not always possible to tell the one from the other. 
RAGHU VIRA 
* For clarity the word se may be prefixed, e. g., T = SET IT.

Baku Geog. A town on the west 
coast of the Caspian Sea, famous for its naphtha springs and mud volcanoes. It is also called Badku, the Sanskrit form of which is asat, mentioned in the Purānas. It appears to have been a place of Hindu pilgrimage and was called महाज्वालामुखी /. (Asiatic

motion Phys. गति f. 
I. First law of motion: A body 
will continue in its state of rest or of uniform motion in a straight line unless acted upon by an external force पिण्डं विश्रामावस्थायां एकरूप ऋजुरेखगतौ वा प्रवर्तते यदि बाह्यबलाभिभूतं न भवति (Hindi जब तक बाह्य बल न लगे तब तक पदार्थ विश्राम अवस्था में अथवः एक 
रूप ऋजुरेख गति में रहेगा) 2. Second law of motion: The 
rate of change of momen tum is proportional to the impressed force and takes place in the direction of the impressed force गमतापरिवर्तनार्थ आरोपितबलानुपाती तद्दिशानुवर्ती च (Hindi गमता के परिवर्तन का अर्घ आरोपित बल का अनुपाती होता है और 
आरोपित बल की दिशा में ही होता है) 3. Third law of motion: Ac 
tion and reaction are equal and opposite क्रिया-प्रतिक्रिये समे प्रतिगामिन्यौ च (Hindi क्रिया और 
प्रतिक्रिया सम और प्राति गामिनी होती हैं) motion for consideration विचारार्थ

उदंच m. stock Com. I (general) स्कन्ध m. 
In the English language it has 37 senses (see Webster), all con nected at the base with Strunk of a tree'. In the commercial world it is the share (or help). स्कन्ध (Hindi aprir) is useable literally as trunk of a tree, or figuratively as "help, assistance' (कन्धा लगाना) 2 (national debt)=public debt राष्ट्र-ऋण . 3 (capital raised in shares by a public company) Hayott f. (short for प्रमंडल-अंशपुंजी) 
4 (goods unsold) अविक्रीतक n. closing s. संवरण स्कन्ध m. deads. मृत स्कन्ध, अविक्रेय स्कन्ध m. deferred s. प्रास्थगित स्कन्ध m. inscribed s. अन्तलिखित स्कन्ध m. 
openings. प्रारंभण स्कन्ध m. s. account स्कन्ध-लेखा f. s. and shares स्कन्ध तथा अंश m. s. and shares broker स्कन्ध तथा ___ अंश मध्यग m.
